sentences.en: A movement caught his eye in the tangled undergrowth.
sentences.cn: 乱灌木丛里的晃动引起了他的注意.

sentences.en: He wormed himself through the undergrowth.
I could hear an animal scuttling about in the undergrowth.
sentences.cn: 我可以听到一只动物在矮树丛中跑来跑去.

sentences.en: I detected a slight movement in the undergrowth.
sentences.cn: 我发现灌木丛中有些动静.

sentences.en: I heard them coming, crashing through the undergrowth, before I saw them.
sentences.cn: 还没看到他们，我便听到他们穿过矮树丛过来的声音。

sentences.en: Some water distilled over the rocks from the moist undergrowth.
sentences.cn: 岩石下潮湿的草丛使石上渗出水滴.

sentences.en: The bushfire actually helped to burn off a lot of dead undergrowth.
sentences.cn: 林区大火实际上有助于清除很多枯死的矮灌木。

sentences.en: The hunters beat a path through the undergrowth.
sentences.cn: 猎人们开了一条路穿过小树丛.

sentences.en: The tiger prowled through the undergrowth.
The undergrowth was so thick that we had to file our way through it.
sentences.cn: 下层灌木丛太密,我们只得成纵队行进.

sentences.en: There were half a dozen foxes skulking in the undergrowth.
sentences.cn: 在林下灌丛中潜伏着五六只狐狸.

sentences.en: They used their knives to clear a path through the dense undergrowth.
sentences.cn: 他们用刀在浓密的灌木丛中劈开一条小路。

sentences.en: Trees, undergrowth and creepers intertwined, blocking our way.
sentences.cn: 树木、灌木丛与藤蔓植物盘根错节，挡住了我们的去路。

sentences.en: We had to bushwhack through undergrowth.
sentences.cn: 我们只好在灌木丛中劈开一条路。

sentences.en: We had to chop a way through the undergrowth.
sentences.cn: 我们必须在矮树林中砍伐出一条路来.

words.tran_cn: 发育不全；生长在大树下的灌木；动物身上长在长毛下面的浓密绒毛

trans.tran_cn: 矮树丛，灌木丛，（动物）浓密绒毛，发育不全
trans.tran_en: bushes, small trees, and other plants growing around and under bigger trees
